channel.title: Merry Christmas
channel.description: I just wanted to be the one to make this topic so i decided to make it a little early. Merry Christmas to all. The only time breaking into a house is considered legal.

item.title: Merry Christmas

The only time breaking into a house is considered legal.

Only if you’re white.

And wearing a red suit.

What if you are red and wearing a white suit?

your a red neck
[/quote]
Moparisthebest breaks into peoples houses?!?

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=331453.msg2595192#msg2595192 date=1229959254]
Mopar’s real reason for not choosing Obama is because he’s a redneck and Obama wants to take his guns away.
[/quote][/quote]

I actually laughed.

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“storkme, post:11, topic:252546”][quote author=King Redrum link=topic=333534.msg2598925#msg2598925 date=1230125722]

Rich white boys are jackasses. Guess what I’m getting for Christmas? :D? A fucking moving notice that I have to be out of my current place of residence on the 31st…
[/quote]Not a Merry Christmas after all eh?

Not at all. Which is why Christmas, New Years and every other holiday is just another day of the year to me. <_<

Now if you don’t celebrate new years you’re just boring.

[img]http://frisk.blog.is/img/tncache/500x500/23/frisk/img/atheist_christmas.jpg[/quote]

I’m an atheist you fuck head…
